text:
It should be nice to have also an if-else controller, instead of using 2
if-controllers
creator: quasar7@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
The Switch Controller can be used for this, as it now supports strings.

Switch (true/false)
+ Simple Controller true
+ Simple Controller false

Even without strings, an if condition can be converted into 0/1 and used with 
a Switch Controller.
